This game is terrible.

As a survivor, your gameplay loop is 1: fix generator.  2: fix exit.  3: win match.  There are no other game modes.  There is no variation aside from an anemic handful of maps.

You have no offensive abilities.  If a killer wants to kill you, the only thing you can do is delay the inevitable, or make killing you more annoying than not killing you.

As a killer, your gameplay loop is 1: chase survivor 2: bonk with weapon 3: hook survivor.  Three times.  For every survivor.  If you want to kill a survivor, you will.  The only challenge is artificial difficulty from interface screw.  Seven foot tall guy made of pure muscle just..forgets how his legs work for one and a half seconds every time he swings a 3 pound meat cleaver, and is stopped by a 35 pound grocery store pallet of the sort that I was stacking eight high one handed when I was 15 years old.

I'm told that the game gets amazing and good.  After investing hundreds of hours into getting curbstomped to earn the perks for the flavor of the month meta build.

Or spending money on overpowered DLC characters.

Or both.

Don't buy this unless you hate yourself.  If your friends want to play this with you, they are terrible people and they hate you.
El mejor juego 10/10

Muito bom, um jogo muito completo, bem estratégico, detalhista, dá pra fazer milhares de combinações referentes as vantagens que se pode usar, com os amigos fica ainda melhor, experiência maravigold :)
great horror game lots of fun

NE JOUEZ PAS A CE JEU EN 2021

J'y ai joué pendant 40heures. On pense vraiment que le jeu est génial au début, amusant, etc.. Puis on voit le matchmacking. Avec mon tueur rank 16 je tombe que sur des joueurs du rank 1 à 5, c'est tout simplement injouable, ils ont toute les compétences qui vont vous cancérifier du début jusqu'à la fin ! Et quand tu joues en survivant, oh comme par miracles tes équipiers sont au même rank nul que toi mais le tueur est rank 1 90% du temps.  Bref NE JOUEZ PAS A CE JEU, NE GACHEZ PAS VOTRE ARGENT ! si vous n'avez pas commencé à jouer au début du jeu comme tout le monde, il n'y a plus de place pour vous, réelement, croyez-moi, ne faîte pas la même erreur que moi, n'achetez pas ce jeu. (Oh et n'oubliez pas que tout les meilleurs survivant sont en DLC, donc 6€ en + pour les avoirs.)
Exciting and thrilling, definetly recommend to play with friends

solo q as survivor is absolutely awful.  q times as killer are long at low ranks and the survivors are not very good so it makes for very boring matches so ranking up would take forever.  other than that its a fun game
Great game as Killer or Survivor with lots of options and hours of fun.

Чётко

DBD is a cautionary tale of a great concept muddled by developer mismanagement. I don't doubt that this game would be a lot better if Behavior weren't at the helm. However, that doesn't mean you shouldn't play it. Bad games can still be fun to play. Not only that, but if you're an aspiring game developer I highly recommend you play this game. Study this game from top to bottom so you can avoid making the same mistakes.

КРУТО ПИЗДЕЦ

Her na tento způsob existuje doopravdy hodně, ale tato hra nabízí několik možností jak jí hrát ( vybírání různých perku které vám během hry pomohou a nebo braní či nacházení různých itemu ve hře ). Hra nabízí hraní za 2 role ( killer = vrah/zabiják, survivor = přeživší ) každý má jeden úkol ( survivor - opravit dostatečný počet generátoru pro otevření brány,  killer = zabít všechny survivory ve hře )


Chtěl bych jenom upozornit že se může stát že abyste si zahrály za killera tak můžete čekat několik minut,       z mé zkušenosti mi to trvalo maximálně asi 15 - 20 minut ( tím hru nehaním nebo ji neodsuzuji, vím že za killera je větší poptávka ).

Ale pokud si chcete zahrát s kamarádem či s kamarádami a přitom vydělávat body budete muset hrát za survivory ( za killera pouze bez bodů ).

Hra nabizí různe questy ze kterých získáte body které můžete použít na nákup zmiňovaných perků nebo itemu. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Z mé strany si hru užívám a sem rád za zajímavé a hezky zpracované spolupráce s různými filmovými studii které přivádí do hry nové killery tak také survivory a nové mapy na kterých můžete hrát.

Líbí se mi levelovací systém na kterém nezáleží pokud jdete hrát s kamarádem tak jestli má větší nebo menší rank.

--------------------------------------Toť pro informování a zhodnocení vše--------------------------------------

Let me save you some time!

It's worth the money, definitely. Once you start playing the game is like a horror game. As time progresses and you get more aquainted with the game you start to realise how many possibilities there are within this game. It's a fun 4 player game, and if you'd like you could play the custom game modes where one of your friends is the killer and the rest of you as survivors. This game is definitely a worthy purchase. All you need to do is to put some time into and it'll be worth, you have my word on that!

Mudando minha analise passada o jogo agora tem um bom balanceamento ainda ocorre erros mais menos, porem a questão do face camping ainda não esta sendo prejudicada de nenhum maneira o que acaba estragando o jogo alheio, vale a compra mas devez enquando tera alguns stresses por esses e outros motivos.
